title: Wife always dreams that she's talking to her dead relatives What does it mean #Assim assim al hakeem
transcript: oh only one okay uh sh uh my wife she mostly dreams of uh her dead relatives talking to her or like ask uh like saying things to her uh could there be any specific reason because we know that dreams are one of the things that comes from Allah directly no most likely this is from shatan messing up with her head she should not eat a lot before going to bed and inshallah she will not have such dreams
